QuestData.Title: Supporting the Troops
QuestData.Description: While it is true that these farmers threaten to overrun us, we still cannot forget about the Alliance's main forces.$b$bTravel west into Andorhal and slay the human soldiers that are fighting with our deathguards. We need all the help we can get.
QuestData.RewardText: You fight well, $n. I wish I had your ability... and your bravery.
